pytorch_privacy.analysis.moment_accountant module¶

Original paper at https://arxiv.org/abs/1607.00133

pytorch_privacy.analysis.moment_accountant.compute_log_moments_from_ledger(ledger, max_lambda=32)[source]¶

Compute the moments of the queries entered into a ledger using the Gaussian Mechanism utilising the Moments Accountant.

Parameters

  • ledger – The ledger of queries to compute for

  • max_lambda – The maximum moment to compute

Returns

The upper bounds for all moments up to max_lambda

pytorch_privacy.analysis.moment_accountant.compute_online_privacy_from_ledger(ledger, log_moments, target_delta=None, target_eps=None, max_lambda=32)[source]¶

Compute the privacy loss of the queries entered into a ledger using the Gaussian Mechanism utilising the Moments Accountant with one of epsilon or delta fixed and composes this with the privacy of previously seen entries, summarised by the log moments.

Parameters

ledger – The ledger of queries to compute for. An incremental

ledger, NOT the whole ledger. :param log_moments: summary log moments of previous queries :param max_lambda: The maximum moment to compute :param target_eps: A target epsilon to aim for. :param target_delta: A target delta to aim for. :return: epsilon, delta

pytorch_privacy.analysis.moment_accountant.compute_privacy_loss_from_ledger(ledger, target_delta=None, target_eps=None, max_lambda=32)[source]¶

Compute the privacy loss of the queries entered into a ledger using the Gaussian Mechanism utilising the Moments Accountant with one of epsilon or delta fixed.

Parameters

  • ledger – The ledger of queries to compute for

  • max_lambda – The maximum moment to compute

  • target_eps – A target epsilon to aim for.

  • target_delta – A target delta to aim for.

Returns

epsilon, delta

pytorch_privacy.analysis.moment_accountant.get_privacy_spent(max_lambda, total_log_moments, target_eps, target_delta)[source]¶
Compute the (epsilon, delta) privacy bound for a given set of log

moments with one of epsilon or delta fixed.

Parameters

  • max_lambda – The maximum moment to consider

  • total_log_moments – The total moments, up to the maximum moment

  • target_eps – A target epsilon to aim for.

  • target_delta – A target delta to aim for.

Returns

epsilon, delta
